DbManager¶

module DbManager Module in charges of storing the acquired annotated data in a database. For now: MongoDB WIP

Module Contents¶

DbManager.MGDB = mongodb://localhost:27017/¶
DbManager.addDocumentInCollection(dbName, collection, jsonContent)¶

addDocumentInCollection

Adds a document/contract (in JSON) in a collection in a database in MongoDB.

Parameters

  • dbName (str) – Name of the database to use in MongoDB.

  • collection (str) – Collection to add the content.

  • jsonContent (json) – Content to insert in the db.

DbManager.storeDocInstance(domain, jsonContractContent)¶

storeDocInstance

Stores an instance (version) of a document in the databse.

Parameters

domain – Name of the the domain considered, such as Ilyeum contract,

EULA, etc., this domain matches a dedicated db in MongoDB? :type domain: str :param jsonContractContent: Content to insert in the db. :type jsonContractContent: json

DbManager.createTextDocument(domain, jsonContractInfo)¶

storeDocInstance

Create a new document/contrac. Stores meta-information about a contract that are independent from its changing contents.

Parameters

domain – Name of the the domain considered, such as Ilyeum contract,

EULA, etc., this domain matches a dedicated db in MongoDB? :type domain: str :param jsonContractInfo: Information about the document to insert in the db. :type jsonContractInfo: json
